body:
## What's Changed
* make gitlab updater work by tag when releases are disabled by @lilyinstarlight in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/219
* print maintainers list by @GaetanLepage in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/222

## New Contributors
* @lilyinstarlight made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/219
* @GaetanLepage made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/222

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/1.1.0...1.1.1

## What's Changed
* make gitlab updater work by tag when releases are disabled by @lilyinstarlight in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/219
* print maintainers list by @GaetanLepage in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/222

## New Contributors
* @lilyinstarlight made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/219
* @GaetanLepage made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/222

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0

## What's Changed

* Support bitbucket.org by @EBADBEEF in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/208
* Add support for updating buildComposerProject's vendorHash by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/217

## New Contributors
* @EBADBEEF made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/208
* @Atemu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/213
* @AkechiShiro made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/215

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/1.0.0...1.1.0

This has been stable for a long time. Time to bump the version to 1.0.0!

## What's Changed
* quote `import_path` when importing in nix by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/191
* ruff: enable upgrade checks by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/192
* unquote versions from github atom feeds by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/193
* support for updating yarn FOD hash by @yu-re-ka in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/68
* Modernize buildsystem by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/199

## New Contributors
* @yu-re-ka made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/68

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.19.3...1.0.0

## What's Changed
* fix escaping for non-toplevel attributes by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/182


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.19.2...0.19.3

## What's Changed
* fix attribute name escaping by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/180


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.19.1...0.19.2

## What's Changed
* escape attribute names by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/179


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.19.0...0.19.1

## What's Changed
* also respect cargoRoot when updating checksum by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/172
* support new goModules attr by @Artturin in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/176

## New Contributors
* @Artturin made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/176

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.18.0...0.19.0

## What's Changed
* nix-update: use nom if in path by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/159
* add diff support for `fetchCrate` by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/162
* git-commit files directly without using staging area by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/171


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.17.2...0.18.0

## What's Changed
* improve version assertions in tests by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/158
* fix updating cargoLock with flakes by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/157


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.17.1...0.17.2

## What's Changed

* improve assertion message by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/155


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.17.0...0.17.1

## What's Changed
* improve error message when no hash is found by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/145
* fix updating `importCargoLock` when `lockFile` is in the nix store by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/148
* switch to go-modules.outputHash by @zowoq in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/150
* consider revision when checking whether there was an update by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/152


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.16.0...0.17.0

## What's Changed
* add support for updating packages using importCargoLock by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/143


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.15.1...0.16.0

## What's Changed
* reject empty hashes by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/139



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.15.0...0.15.1

## What's Changed
* nix-update: add url parameter to override the repository discovery by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/137
* remove trailing `.git` for github diff urls by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/138


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.14.0...0.15.0

## What's Changed
* gitea support by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/134
* fix build with updated nixpkgs by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/136


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.13.0...0.14.0

## What's Changed
* Added the ability to update PHP extensions using this tool, thanks to @drupol (https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/123)
* Added the --system flag, thanks to @figsoda (https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/130)

## New Contributors
* @drupol made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/124

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.12.0...0.13.0

## What's Changed
* default attribute to $UPDATE_NIX_ATTR_PATH by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/120
  This is set by the nixpkgs updater and will make it possible to omit the attrPath in nix-update-script.



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.11.0...0.11.1

## What's Changed
* add flag to run passthru.updateScript if possible by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/115
* prefer versions with the same prefix by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/116
* Flakes support by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/118


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.10.0...0.11.0

## What's Changed
* update unstable packages from git to latest branch by @schnusch in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/76
* nix_update: use -L to get more logs when building by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/114
* Add diff feature by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/113

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.9.0...0.10.0

## What's Changed
* add fetchCrate support by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/102
* add support for cargoDeps by @figsoda in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/107
* add support for npmDeps by @winterqt in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/109
* add changelog feature by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/101

## New Contributors
* @figsoda made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/102
* @winterqt made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/109

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.8.0...0.9.0

## What's Changed
* Build npm package by @winterqt  in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/100

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.7.0...0.8.0

name: Support new style buildRustPackage und buildGoModule hashes
body:
## What's Changed
* fix python tests by @zowoq in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/97
* add vendorHash by @zowoq in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/95 and https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/96

## New Contributors
* @zowoq made their first contribution in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/96

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.6.0...0.7.0

## What's Changed
* fix finding git directories for non-default import paths by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/92
* allow to manually override filename that is patched by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/93


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.5.1...0.6.0

## What's Changed

* Add --write-commit-message for use in scripting by @schnusch in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/77
* Do not stage files when updating by @SuperSandro2000 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/79
* Don't override existing experimental features by @Mic92 in https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/pull/91


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mic92/nix-update/compare/0.5.0...0.5.1

name: New sources and better rust support
body:
- add support for savannah hosted projects. thanks to @schnusch 
- add support for sourcehut hosted projects, thanks to @SuperSandro2000 
- add support for updating cargoHash, thanks to @SuperSandro2000 
- In nixpkgs, nix-update now ignores local overlays, thanks to @SuperSandro2000 
- cargo hashes and go vendor hashes cannot be updated even if the version has not changed

name: More features.
body:
New features:
- `--version=unstable` will include all versions
containing '-' and '+' from being considered valid.
As per SemVer, these are the separators for unstable
versions (i.e. "-RC2", "+abcdef" suffixes).
- `--review` flag can be used to initiate a run of
[nixpkgs-review](https://github.com/Mic92/nixpkgs-review), which will ensure all
dependent packages can be built.
- In order to ensure consistent formatting, the `--format` flag will invoke
[nixpkgs-fmt](https://github.com/nix-community/nixpkgs-fmt).

Bugfixes:
- nix-update now works if checkMeta is enabled in `~/.nixpkgs/config`

name: Support new nix cli syntax
body: nixUnstable now moved hash conversion functions to the `hash` subcommand.

name: Fix unbound variable
body: Thanks to @petabyteboy
